Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface StudentContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bag, Chamber, Hall, Island, StudentMoverCharacterCard
public interface StudentContainer
The StudentContainer interface contains the necessary methods for managing additions and deletions of students in the objects that contain them

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<Clan,Integer>
    addStudents(Map<Clan,Integer> students)
    The method addStudents adds, if possible, all the students contained in the parameter, if not, for every Clan, it adds all the students it can; it returns an array with the students that were effectively added
    Map<Clan,Integer>
    removeStudents(Map<Clan,Integer> students)
    The method removeStudents removes, if possible, all the students contained in the parameter, if not, for every Clan, it removes all the students it can; it returns an array with the students that were effectively removed

  • Method Details

    • addStudents

      Map<Clan,Integer> addStudents(Map<Clan,Integer> students)
      The method addStudents adds, if possible, all the students contained in the parameter, if not, for every Clan, it adds all the students it can; it returns an array with the students that were effectively added
      Parameters:
      students - the students to add
      Returns:
      the actual added students

    • removeStudents

      Map<Clan,Integer> removeStudents(Map<Clan,Integer> students)
      The method removeStudents removes, if possible, all the students contained in the parameter, if not, for every Clan, it removes all the students it can; it returns an array with the students that were effectively removed
      Parameters:
      students - the students to remove
      Returns:
      the actual removed students
